name: Just Dodge (MrDracodi)
description:
Just Dodge is a hyper-casual mobile friendly bullet-hell game where your goal is to survive the longest.
Controls:

Step1: Use Mouse or touch for jumping around.

Step2: You can destroy blue bullets but they will turn red after short time.

Step3: Survive

The game was made just by me for the Bullet Hell 2022 Jam around the theme: Confined
 , using BulletFury for highly optimised bullet generation and management.

Let me know in the comments what your score was and how you liked it!
